allow: Bash(powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File ".specify/scripts/powershell/create-new-feature.ps1" -Json "update in docasuaurus texbook  for RAG chatbot in constitution" -Number 3 -ShortName "rag-chatbot-integration")

Bash(powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File ".specify/scripts/powershell/create-new-feature.ps1" -Json -ShortName "rag-chatbot-integration" -Number 3 -FeatureDescription "update in docasuaurus texbook  for RAG chatbot in constitution")

Bash(.specify/scripts/powershell/create-new-feature.ps1 -Json "Embedding and Vectorization Pipeline for Book Content \(RAG Chatbot\)

Target audience:
Backend engineers and AI system developers integrating a RAG chatbot with a Docusaurus-based book website

Focus:
- Crawling deployed book URLs
- Extracting clean, structured text content
- Generating semantic embeddings using Cohere models
- Persisting embeddings in Qdrant vector database for retrieval" -Json -Number 4 -ShortName "embedding-pipeline")

Bash(.specify/scripts/bash/create-new-feature.sh "Embedding and Vectorization Pipeline for Book Content \(RAG Chatbot\)

Target audience:
Backend engineers and AI system developers integrating a RAG chatbot with a Docusaurus-based book website

Focus:
- Crawling deployed book URLs
- Extracting clean, structured text content
- Generating semantic embeddings using Cohere models
- Persisting embeddings in Qdrant vector database for retrieval" --number 4 --short-name "embedding-pipeline")
Bash(git add website/docs/exercises.md website/docs/references.md website/docusaurus.config.js website/sidebars.js)
